mapper.select: select P.PNO, P.TITLE, P.PRICE, date_format(ST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as ST_DATE, date_format(EN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as EN_DATE, date_format(DEV_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as DEV_DATE, P.TOTAL_CNT, ifnull(API_CNT, 0) as API_CNT, ifnull(API_CNT*100/TOTAL_CNT, 0) as PERCENT, datediff(EN_DATE,ST_DATE) as REST, PP.PATH as PATH from PURCHS P left outer join PCH_PHOT PP on P.PNO = PP.PNO

select P.PNO, PP.PATH, P.TITLE, P.PRICE, date_format(ST_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as ST_DATE, date_format(EN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as EN_DATE, date_format(DEV_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') as DEV_DATE, TOTAL_CNT, ifnull(API_CNT, 0) as API_CNT from PURCHS P left outer join PCH_PHOT PP on P.PNO = PP.PNO where P.PNO=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into PURCHS( TITLE, PRICE, ST_DATE, EN_DATE, DEV_DATE, TOTAL_CNT, PATH) values(#{title},#{price},#{startDate},#{endDate},#{deliveryDate},#{totalCount},#{path})
